channel.title: {PI} Public Void Problem {PI}
channel.description:
Ok I've been trying to fix this myself for about 2 days now and no matter what I do it doesn't work. When I compile it says, "src/server/model/players/packets/commands.java:740: illegal start of expression
public void moderatorcommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^
Ok so all these commands have been put in a text document attached to this post. I added them into the document because I cannot post them here due to the maximum of 20000 characters limit.
So please help because I cannot update anything until this gets fixed and I am an intermediate coder and what I am thinking is that it is not recognizing the public void because of a code error above it but I could be wrong. It does not seem as there is a coding error above it but it could be. It did not show up on the compiler but there's always a chance. Anyways I would appreciate the help.

Ok I removed a voting system I did not like and I’ve added everything from the bottom of the moderator public void and up to this txt document. I’ve edited my first post and it should be the second txt document.
